snippet: The boutique investment bank found a muted reception from investors on Thursday; shares in the firm were down about 13 percent in the early afternoon.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. de la MERCED

abstract: DealBook Online;  boutique investment bank PJT Partners gets reserved reception on first day as publicly traded firm; shares fall 12.5 percent; shop is valued at about $722.5 million.
lead_paragraph: The boutique investment bank found a muted reception from investors on Thursday; shares in the firm were down about 13 percent in the early afternoon.

headline.main: Shares of PJT Partners Decline on Debut
